attributes.action: Investigate the obvious crimes being commited in internet videos involving "Honour Killings", "Punishment Killings"', and "Stonings"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It takes a couple of minutes of searching on popular sites such as Google and Yahoo to arrive at videos and other evidence of men and women being  abused, tortured and killed in "Honour Killings", "Punishment Killings"', "Stonings" and other lynch mob tortures for acts that are wholly undeserving of such treatment regardless of religion, denomination, creed or colour.  

A democratic, moral and humane stand needs to be taken by the Prime Minister and the British Public jointly to demonstrate our wholehearted condemnation of these abhorant acts, including prosecution of any known offenders and active lobbying of foreign governments to eradicate these self-serving and cowardly crimes.

Join with me in petitioning the Prime Minister to investigate all such crimes immediately, bring the offenders to justice and deter or prevent any further undemocratic or inhuman acts from taking place.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
